item.title: Armagnac | L' Encantada, Domaine de Artigaux, 1986
item.description: Background # I think I’ve provided enough background on L’Encantada here so I’ll be brief and only discuss the domain…or will I?

item.title: Armagnac | L' Encantada, Domaine de Bellair, 1974
item.description: 8/10. A wonderful, half-century old armagnac that is beautifully balanced.
